name: Run It Down
description:
Game was made as a submission to the DevSquad2020 game jam which is also our first one:
https://itch.io/jam/devsquad-2020

Written with JavaScript using Phaser3 framework.

Its an arcade game in which you ski down the map avoiding obstacles andsimultaneously collect coffee in order for Santa not to run out of energy.

Oh yeah... Also portals are there...

Look, Santa is a busy man ok?
